name: logged.js
description: logging library without any dependencies inspired from python builtin logging package

scripts.deno:ts-nocheck: for tsfile in $(ls deno/*.ts); do echo '// @ts-nocheck' | cat - $tsfile > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out $tsfile; done
scripts.deno:build: yarn deno:copy && yarn deno:extention && yarn deno:ts-nocheck

author: Yuichiro Smith <contact@yu-smith.com>
